head: cursor/fixing-code-bugs-16bc
title: PGN: moves SAN/clock matrices; keyed [SAN, clock]; Format column; no formatting
body:
- Moves SAN and Moves Clock sheets: each game one row, columns 1w/1b/2w/2b
- Moves Summary JSON now stores [SAN, clock] per key
- Added Format column (Bullet/Blitz/Rapid, Daily, Live 960, Daily 960, variants)
- Removed all Sheet formatting to reduce timeouts

Latest commit: 991ee09b1c6602f0e9a5633ab45ac53e4d329e04
